Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT

Title: Relates to the green roof tax abatement for certain properties in a city of one million or more persons
Summary: Decreases certain soil depth requirements; raises the tax abatement rate of non-priority; extends the application deadline for purposes of the green roof tax abatement for certain properties in a city of one million or more persons.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to decreasing certain soil depth requirements, raising the tax abatement rate of non-priority and extending the application deadline for purposes of the green roof tax abatement for certain properties in a city of one million or more persons
